import React from "react" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { removeProduct } from '../../redux/basket/basketSlice' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { routes } from '../../App' import './BasketPage.scss' function BasketPage() { const navigate = useNavigate() const { basketList, sum } = useSelector(state => state.basket) const handleClick = (card) => { dispatch(removeProduct(card)) } return (

Корзина с выбранными товарами

{basketList.length > 0 ?
    { basketList.map((x, index) =>

  • {x.title}

    {x.price} ₽
    • ) }
:
Корзина пуста
}

Заказ на сумму: {sum} ₽

) } export default BasketPage;
